languages.text: "Тогда позвольте задать один вопрос мне. Вас заинтересовало мое имя, губернатор Медина. Почему?"
"Then permit me to ask a question. My name aroused your interest, Governor Medineh. Why?"
languages.original_text: "Тогда позвольте задать один вопрос мне. Вас заинтересовало мое имя, губернатор Медина. Почему?"

traits.locale_text: "Then permit me to ask a question. My name aroused your interest, Governor Medineh. Why?"
"Then permit me to ask a question. My name aroused your interest, Governor Medineh. Why?"
"Then permit me to ask a question. My name aroused your interest, Governor Medineh. Why?"
"Then permit me to ask a question. My name aroused your interest, Governor Medineh. Why?"
"Then permit me to ask a question. My name aroused your interest, Governor Medineh. Why?"
"Then permit me to ask a question. My name aroused your interest, Governor Medineh. Why?"

languages.text: "Dann gestattet mir, Euch eine Frage zu stellen. Mein Name hat Euer Interesse geweckt, Gouverneur Medineh. Warum?"
languages.original_text: "Then permit me to ask a question. My name aroused your interest, Governor Medineh. Why?"

traits.locale_text: "Dann gestattet mir, Euch eine Frage zu stellen. Mein Name hat Euer Interesse geweckt, Gouverneur Medineh. Warum?"

languages.text: « Alors, permettez-moi de vous poser une question. Mon nom a éveillé votre intérêt, gouverneur Medineh. Pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: "Then permit me to ask a question. My name aroused your interest, Governor Medineh. Why?"

traits.locale_text: « Alors, permettez-moi de vous poser une question. Mon nom a éveillé votre intérêt, gouverneur Medineh. Pourquoi ? »

languages.text: “既然如此，请允许我问个问题。梅迪涅总督，为什么我的名字让你很感兴趣？”
languages.original_text: "Then permit me to ask a question. My name aroused your interest, Governor Medineh. Why?"

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，请允许我问个问题。梅迪涅总督，为什么我的名字让你很感兴趣？”

languages.text: 「質問を許して欲しい。メディネ総督、私の名前が気になったようだが、その理由は？」
languages.original_text: "Then permit me to ask a question. My name aroused your interest, Governor Medineh. Why?"

traits.locale_text: 「質問を許して欲しい。メディネ総督、私の名前が気になったようだが、その理由は？」

languages.text: «Entonces permítame hacerle una pregunta. Mi nombre despertó su interés, Gobernador Medineh. ¿Por qué?».
languages.original_text: "Then permit me to ask a question. My name aroused your interest, Governor Medineh. Why?"

traits.locale_text: «Entonces permítame hacerle una pregunta. Mi nombre despertó su interés, Gobernador Medineh. ¿Por qué?».

languages.text: "O hâlde izin verin, ben sorayım. Adım ilginizi çekti Vali Medineh. Neden?"
languages.original_text: "Then permit me to ask a question. My name aroused your interest, Governor Medineh. Why?"

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde izin verin, ben sorayım. Adım ilginizi çekti Vali Medineh. Neden?"
